page.title: 10Bwlch-y-groes 8th June (2)
page.content: While we were walking I heard somebody say"Marged is keeping up very well." When we had walked five miles we stopped outside the Fox and Hounds to have something to eat.When we reached Bwlch-y-groes square I was very tired but it was worth the journey.The pain first started when I was walking past Llyn Ffynonne.It stopped when I had walked on about half a mile.Another time when I had pain was when we were walking up the hill next to the Fox and Hounds.It was as if it would never end.That night my parents and I went out to have a Chinese meal in Cardigan because it was my father's birthday and as a reward for our long walk.Now that the sponsors' money has all been collected I am very happy to be able to report that over Â£322 has been paid into the bank.A very good day's work!
